name: Land War
description: Local 8 player strategy! Expand your territory and be the last square standing! Simple controls for casual friends and deep strategy for gamers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 74 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
